page.title: 02Trench digger
page.content: One of the trench diggers that we saw on our visit to the Ministry of Defence site is able to dig trenches twice as fast as any normal digger. It resembles a giant chainsaw which is attached to a lorry.When it is needed,the driver switches it on and the huge chainsaw turns to a vertical position and goes directly into the ground.When it has reached its maximum depth,the lorry moves,with the chainsaw continuing to operate,eventually making a trench.It took about 3 minutes to dig a trench 10 foot long,6 foot deep and 3 foot wide.
